annotations.description: Rex and Daniel have a showdown of several Hot Toddy recipes recommended in the Whiskey Tribe - and promptly forget that the winner should actually be... a Ho...
annotations.title: How To Hot Toddy: 6 Whisk(e)y Recipes Compared

textContent:
Elijah Craig small batch
Hot apple cider
Dollop of butter

Mix in glass with cinnamon stick

title: Barton Halling Hot Toddy
